For each of species collected, use reports (URs) (citations) were counted. The UR may be defined as the utilization of a part of a plant species for a disease, as mentioned by an informant [ 24]. To determine the informant consensus factor (Fic), the reported species were arranged in various groups, according to the ailment treated [ 25], and nine ailment categories were prepared from the data.
